name: 5Min Robin Hood
description:
This game was made for the GDevelop Weekend Jam #1 

The levels follow each other randomly and you must hit the targets within the allotted time.

Depending on the levels, hit each of the targets to get a bonus.

Controls :

On PC, use the mouse to aim and the right button to shoot.

On mobile, press to aim and release to shoot.

LILUO -> https://liluo.io/rsdesign/5-min-robin-hood
